Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Currency
Class.Description: A numeric, fixed-point value having two places to the right of the decimal

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init() if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
value = attribute->value
if value matches "0N'.'2N" then return attribute end else attribute->addError(@ME->%ClassName() : ": " : value : " is not in currency format.") return attribute end
